## Set up renku platform

1. Access to RENKU: [https://renkulab.io/](https://renkulab.io/)
2. Log in to RENKU with edu-ID / GitHub / ORCID
3. Search Project: moko.13.ts/polyploid-rna-seq-analyses

##

4. Select the project

    ![project](./photos/Project.png)

##

**5. Fork the project**

Click "Fork" icon.

![Fork](./photos/Fork.png)

##

Change the project name to distingish from original.
Then click "Fork Project" icon

![Name](./photos/change_names.png)

## Wait for a while...

## Project setting

::: {style="font-size: 0.8em"}

1. Click "V" icon
2. Select "Start with options"
3. Select:
    - rstudio
    - 2 CPU
    - 8G RAM
    - 64G storage
4. Click "Start session" icon.

:::

![](./photos/setting.png){.absolute top=50 right=50 width=50%}

## Wait for a while until it loaded!

Start page looks like Rstudio.

Click "terminal" to use command line.

![](./photos/start.png)
